short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you open a tab that plays an ad, the sound will be muted automatically so you won't have to hear it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute ads on a page. This extension mutes ads on websites by detecting when they are playing audio, and then muting the tab. It also checks for ad-specific HTML elements and known ad domains, ensuring a seamless browsing experience. This extension is ideal for anyone who finds ads disruptive while browsing the web.
